notice.startUsingTitle: Start using the Devops Tool now(FR)
notice.startUsingDesc: Not sure what the DevOps Tool is? Continue [reading below](#welcomeNoticeTitle).(FR)
notice.takeTheSurveyDesc: Click [here](#/survey), or click “Survey” in the top menu bar to start the survey.(FR)
notice.calculateTeamResultsDesc: Click [here](#/teamSurveys), or click “Team results” in the top menu bar to start calulating team results.(FR)
notice.section1p2: You can compare previous test results to current test results to see your personal growth over time.(FR)
notice.section1p4: You can calulate teams results and can evaluate the teams overall growth and success or compare to your teams previous test results.(FR)
notice.section2p1: You are not required to answer each section in a single visit, but we encourage teams to complete them all at least once to establish a full baseline.(FR)
notice.section2p3: Aprox. 60 minutes to complete all 11 sections(FR)
notice.section3p2: Responses to the DevOps Self-Assessment are stored locally on your computer (browser's cache), and the Government of Canada does not save any information.(FR)
notice.section3p4: Only the responses of ESDC employees connected to the VPN will be saved anonymously for analysis by the DevOps CoE and IT Strategy team.(FR)
notice.welcomeNoticeBody:
L'outil suivant est basé sur le rapport sur l'état du DevOps qui est publié chaque année depuis 2014, dans le cadre de la recherche et de l'évaluation du DevOps (DORA). 

Les questions de l'outil permettront de mesurer et de soutenir l'amélioration continue de la maturité DevOps à la DGIIT et à EDSC.  

Teams are invited to complete the self-assesment every 6 (six) to 12 (twelve) months **to measure their success**. However, you may use the tool at your discretion all year around as a team or individually.(FR)
notice.noProgress: L'auto-évaluation DevOps n'a pas encore commencée. Veuillez choisir une section à compléter.

teamResults.title: Team Results Overview(FR)
teamResults.description: Results will apear below once you have uploaded 1 or more survey(s).(FR)
teamResults.uploadDesc: Choose files. To compare results upload one group of surveys into Survey(s) A and the additional group to Survey(s) B(FR)
teamResults.showIndividualBreakdownInstruction: **NOTE**: Click on team name to show individual breakdown(FR)
